title: Meteor Mining Colony Adventure #15
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Mining Equipment Bay
rooms.description: A utilitarian chamber filled with mining equipment and protective gear. Meteor dust covers every surface, and the air recyclers hum steadily. Lockers line the walls, and a workbench holds various tools. Warning lights blink on a status panel. Through a reinforced viewport, you can see the cratered surface of the asteroid and the vast darkness of space beyond.

items.name: equipment workbench
items.description: A sturdy metal workbench covered in tools and repair equipment

items.name: plasma cutting tool
items.description: A handheld plasma cutter used for cutting through metal locks

items.name: storage locker unit
items.description: A bank of metal lockers with three compartments for mining equipment

items.name: colony operations manual
items.description: A worn manual with operational procedures
items.text: METEOR MINING COLONY ALPHA - Established 2089. Operations Director: Commander Sarah Voss. Chief Engineer: Dr. Marcus Kane. All personnel must familiarize themselves with emergency evacuation procedures. Processed ore is stored in the central processing facility before transport.

items.name: security access card
items.description: A magnetic access card labeled 'PROCESSING FACILITY ACCESS'

items.name: equipment status panel
items.description: A digital display showing equipment status and alerts
items.text: SYSTEM STATUS: Life support nominal. Mining operations suspended. Emergency protocol active. Warning: Meteor impact detected in sector 7. All personnel report to emergency stations.

items.name: locked tool cabinet
items.description: A heavy cabinet with a damaged lock that could be cut through

items.name: safety inspection log
items.description: A datapad with safety inspection records
items.text: Safety Log Entry 47: Commander Voss has ordered all emergency systems checked. Dr. Kane reports the escape pods in the evacuation bay are fully operational. Remember: in case of emergency, proceed to the evacuation bay. Authorization requires knowledge of colony protocols.

items.name: rack of mining suits
items.description: Heavy-duty protective suits for working in the asteroid environment

items.name: note inside helmet
items.description: A handwritten note tucked inside a helmet
items.text: Reminder: The combination to locker B is the year this colony was established. Check the operations manual if you forgot. - Kane

items.name: reinforced pressure door
items.description: A heavy door with a card reader leading to the processing facility

rooms.name: Ore Processing Facility
rooms.description: A large industrial space dominated by ore processing machinery and conveyor systems. Containers of refined minerals are stacked along the walls. Computer terminals display mining data and production quotas. The machinery is silent now, covered in a fine layer of meteor dust. A sealed emergency hatch leads to the evacuation bay.

items.name: main processing terminal
items.description: A computer terminal displaying production data and colony information
items.text: PRODUCTION REPORT: Colony Alpha has processed 50,000 tons of ore since establishment. Operations Director: Commander Sarah Voss. Facility Manager: Dr. Marcus Kane. All refined ore stored in this facility before shipment to Earth.

items.name: personnel assignment board
items.description: A digital board showing crew assignments and photos
items.text: CREW ROSTER: Commander Sarah Voss - Operations Director, overall colony command. Dr. Marcus Kane - Chief Engineer, maintains all systems. Location: Emergency evacuation bay is located in the northern section.

items.name: stacked ore containers
items.description: Metal containers filled with processed minerals

items.name: shipping manifest
items.description: A document listing ore shipments and destinations
items.text: SHIPMENT LOG: All processed ore from this facility is transported to Earth for distribution. Commander Voss authorizes all shipments. Next transport scheduled pending emergency resolution.

items.name: processing control console
items.description: The main control station for ore processing operations

items.name: emergency procedures guide
items.description: A laminated card with evacuation protocols
items.text: EMERGENCY EVACUATION PROTOCOL: In case of critical emergency, proceed to evacuation bay. Security verification required. You must confirm: Who commands this colony? Where is processed ore stored? What is your role?

items.name: maintenance station
items.description: A workstation with repair tools and diagnostic equipment

items.name: engineer's notes
items.description: Technical notes written by Dr. Kane
items.text: System Check: All evacuation bay systems operational. Commander Voss has final authority on all evacuations. As Chief Engineer, I've ensured the escape pods are ready. Any miner can access them in an emergency by answering the security questions.

items.name: emergency supply crate
items.description: A crate marked with emergency supply symbols

items.name: colony identification patch
items.description: A fabric patch reading 'Meteor Mining Colony Alpha - Miner'
items.text: You are a miner working on Meteor Mining Colony Alpha. Your job is to extract and process valuable minerals from the asteroid.

items.name: emergency evacuation hatch
items.description: A sealed hatch leading to the evacuation bay. A security terminal displays three verification questions.

password_questions.question: Who commands this colony?
password_questions.hint: Check the colony manual and personnel board

password_questions.question: Where is processed ore stored?
password_questions.hint: Look at the production terminal and shipping manifest

password_questions.question: What is your role?
password_questions.hint: The colony patch identifies your position

rooms.name: Emergency Evacuation Bay
rooms.description: You've reached the evacuation bay! A row of sleek escape pods sits ready in their launch tubes. Emergency lights bathe everything in red. Through the launch windows, you can see the stars and the safety of open space. The nearest pod's hatch is open, its systems showing green across the board. Freedom is just a launch sequence away.

items.name: emergency escape pods
items.description: Compact spacecraft designed for emergency evacuation to the nearest space station

items.name: launch control panel
items.description: The control system for pod launches, displaying ready status

items.name: emergency beacon
items.description: An active distress beacon transmitting your location to rescue ships

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You climb into the escape pod and seal the hatch. The launch sequence initiates automatically, and within seconds you're rocketing away from the damaged mining colony. Through the viewport, you watch the asteroid shrink behind you as the pod's autopilot sets course for the nearest space station. You've survived the meteor mining colony emergency and escaped to safety. You win!
